title: My whole account has been wiped
body: I was playing yesterday morning and took a short two hour break. When I went to log back in, my LvL had been set back to 1 and everything including my purchased champion and skins are gone. Any idea as to why this is happening? I already put in a ticket but  I'm the type of person that needs to understand how and why. Any information would be amazing.

replies.body: Yikes, that'd be pretty heckin' rude of us right? I'm looking over your account now, and it doesn't look like there has been any purchases or that this account has ever been at level 30. It might be possible that you were talking about a different account, but in either case you can reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so that we can look into it further for you!
